description:
Ref: parent epic bw-d5l, Phase 4.

Depends on Phase 3 (bw-d5l.3). This is the final gate before the epic can be closed.

Verify all of the following:
- [ ] All existing tests pass (go test ./...)
- [ ] No command calls getInitializedRepo() directly — only main.go does
- [ ] Commands that don't need store have NeedsStore: false and receive nil
- [ ] Tests inject env.Store directly — no redundant commits to sync stores
- [ ] Cache is exercised: a command that reads an issue twice only deserializes once (dedicated test exists)
- [ ] ClearCache exists and is called after sync/rebase operations
- [ ] go vet clean
- [ ] staticcheck clean (if available)

Once all checks pass, close this ticket and the parent epic.
title: Acceptance: verify epic completion criteria
